name: becoming landscape
description:
This flatgame is an improvisationally-created demo poemware made live in front of an audience for the Babycastles Academy twitch stream on April 19, 2020 during COVID-19.

In certain ways it is 'unfinished'. It's a quick experience. In other ways, maybe it's droneware and should be left on in the background.

There are no goals, no dialog, nothing to do but become landscape.

More info on how to make a 'flatgame':

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLsB2lqbKJIMZ-Gj19IXN9Rrk2DzphCvUO

Coincidentally I see it's Ludum Dare 46 weekend so sure it's a submission (Keep it Alive).

Thanks
